desc: A little Shut Eye is a powerful thing. Our fast-acting all-natural sleep slips are designed to help you start feeling sleepy in about 10 minutes. Simply place a Shut Eye slip under your tongue, let it dissolve, and drift away to sweet slumber. No more tossing and turning, just deep, restful sleep.

layout.text: Fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer. Naturally.
Shut Eye is a revolutionary new sleep aid utilizing hemp and other plant compounds to help you sleep your best.
